V\u1ecb tr&iacute; tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng t\u1ea1i \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay t\u1ea7m 12 ph&uacute;t l&aacute;i xe. C&aacute;ch H\u1ed9i An 30 ph&uacute;t l&aacute;i xe.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n 5 sao g\u1ed3m 12 t\u1ea7ng. V\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u h\u1ea1ng ph&ograve;ng cho du kh&aacute;ch l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t, Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf theo m&ocirc; h&igrave;nh ch\u1eef T n&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u1ec1u nh&igrave;n th\u1ea5y bi\u1ec3n. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 trang thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v&agrave; trang tr&iacute; b\u1edfi n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t cao c\u1ea5p.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n 5 sao c&oacute; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ho&agrave;n h\u1ea3o nh\u01b0 nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng, ph&ograve;ng gym, bar, h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i tr\u01b0\u1edbc bi\u1ec3n,..<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"600\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/2(12).jpg\" width=\"800\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"khach-san-my-khe-duc-long-da-nang","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"0","icon":"1691630505_3.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691630505","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"19","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N M\u1ef8 KH\u00ca \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110\u00c0 N\u1eb4NG","seo_title_en":"","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N M\u1ef8 KH\u00ca \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110\u00c0 N\u1eb4NG","seo_keywords_en":"","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N M\u1ef8 KH\u00ca \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110\u00c0 N\u1eb4NG","seo_description_en":"","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"}]
